explains: v. 预先决定；命中注定；（使）预先有意向（predetermine 的过去式及过去分词）

sentences.en: The capsules can be made to release the pesticides at a predetermined time.
sentences.cn: 可使这些胶囊在预定时间释放出杀虫剂。

sentences.en: The sex of the embryo is predetermined at fertilization.
sentences.cn: 胚胎的性别早在受精时就决定了。

sentences.en: An alarm sounds when the temperature reaches a predetermined level.
sentences.cn: 温度一达到预设的度数，警报就会响起来。
